title: Modeling of mercury deposition in India: evaluating emission inventories and anthropogenic impacts
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00324A, Paper
Chakradhar Reddy Malasani, Basudev Swain, Ankit Patel, Yaswanth Pulipatti, Nidhi L. Anchan, Amit Sharma, Marco Vountas, Pengfei Liu, Sachin S. Gunthe
Fragile ecosystems (Western Ghats and Himalayas), and major rice cultivation areas are vulnerable to highest Hg deposition. Indian anthropogenic emissions strongly influence deposition fluxes with varying regional impacts.
